newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Howard says next Australian budget in May 97.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Howard says next Australian budget in May 97.

text.p: Australian Prime Minister John Howard said the next budget would be delivered in May 1997, and he did not anticipate making any changes to the 1996/97 (July-June) budget delivered on Tuesday.
"The next budget will be brought down in May, and we'll start work on it early in the new year," Howard said in respone to a question in a radio interview on 6PR.
"I don't anticipate making any adjustments to this budget. That doesn't mean to say we won't make economic decisions between now and the next budget," Howard said.
The delivery of the budget was brought forward to May from August in 1994 by the previous Labor administration.
Because of the March election this year, the budget was returned to August.
